document.title: Pellete de liens du 29-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Apprendre REST - un style d'architecture du Web ( via ) REST est un style architectural permettant de developper des applications Web. Vous trouverez dans ces pages un ensemble de ressources pour pouvoir developper vos services Web en respectant ce style d'architecture. (Tags: web rest dev conception api )
Extreme Programming (XP) ( via ) Presentation de la methode eXtreme Programming. (Tags: dev faq xp )
Color Schemer - Online Color Scheme Generator ( via ) Enter an RGB or HEX value, or click on the Color Palette below (Tags: online tools webdesign color **** )
InterfaceLIFT: High-Resolution Wallpaper Getting tired of the default desktop backgrounds supplied by your operating system? InterfaceLIFT offers high quality wallpaper from the best photographers and digital artists on the web. (Tags: design photo wallpaper )
TracOnDebian - The Trac Project - Trac ( via ) Installing and Running Trac on Debian (Tags: debian svn trac gestion-de-projet concption )
